entities.description: The relationship between the victim and the offender.
Indicates whether the victim was the parent.
Indicates whether the victim was a sibling.
Indicates whether the victim was a child.
Indicates whether the victim was a grandparent.
Indicates whether the victim was a grandchild.
Indicates whether the victim was an in-law.
Indicates whether the victim was a stepparent.
Indicates whether the victim was a stepchild.
Indicates whether the victim was a stepsibling.
Indicates whether the victim was another family member.
Indicates whether the victim was the offender.
Indicates whether the victim was an acquaintance.
Indicates whether the victim was a friend.
Indicates whether the victim was a neighbor.
Indicates whether the victim was a babysittee (the baby).
Indicates whether the victim was a boyfriend or girlfriend.
Indicates whether the victim was the child of a boyfriend or girlfriend.
Indicates whether the relationship was homosexual.
Indicates whether the victim was an ex-spouse.
Indicates whether the victim was an employee.
Indicates whether the victim was an employer.
Indicates whether the victim was otherwise known.
Indicates whether the victim was a stranger.
Indicates whether the victim was in an ex-relationship (Ex-boyfriend/ex-girlfriend).

relationships.description: Defines the relationship between the victim and the offender.
